title: Part 5 - Executive Orders (George E. Pataki)
content:
Part 5 - Executive Orders (George E. Pataki)

State Regulations
§ 5.1 - Executive Order No. 1: Ordering a Freeze on Hiring. [*]

§ 5.5 - Executive Order No. 5: Ordering that the Commissioner of the Department of Correctional Services bar the transfer of certain inmates sentenced as violent Felony Offenders to Temporary Release Programs and Residential Treatment Facilities. [*][DAGGER]
§ 5.6 - Executive order no. 6: requiring the attorney general to supersede the district attorney of otsego county with respect to the prosecution of the homicide allegations regarding colin hyde

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
